gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 122, Hawks 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Hawks, 122-99. Brandon Miller led the way with 26 points, six rebounds, and four assists for the Hornets, with Tre Mann adding 21 points, eight rebounds, and six assists in the victory. Jalen Johnson tallied 19 points and 12 rebounds for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Hornets improve to 13-41, while the Hawks fall to 24-31.
